summary: I WAS DRIVING TO PICK UP SOME DINNER FOR ME AND MY WIFE WHEN A HUMMING NOISE CAME ON FROM THE BACK PASSENGER SIDE OF THE VEHICLE. AS I SLOWED DOWN THE CAR SHUT OFF. THE HUMMING NOISE IS NOT THE FIRST TIME I HAVE HEARD IT. NOT ONLY THAT EVERY TIME I REFUEL MY VEHICLE IT STRUGGLES TO START WHICH I HAVE TO GIVE IT GAS TO TURN OVER.
